	<div class="sg-instructions">
		<p style="text-align:center;"><span style="font-size:large;"><img src="https://surveygizmolibrary.s3.amazonaws.com/library/191555/LOL_LOGOSmallTransparent.png" alt="" /><br /></span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;"><span style="font-size:large;">Obrigado por responder à pesquisa de satisfação de League of Legends! Esse feedback é importante para nós, pois suas respostas nos ajudarão a encontrar e abordar quaisquer problemas que tiver, assim como aprimorar nosso desenvolvimento. Suas respostas serão mantidas confidencialmente e não serão usadas para qualquer propósito senão o de pesquisa conduzida pela Riot Games. Essa pesquisa leva de 5 a 10 minutos para ser completada.</span></p>	</div>

</div>

		<div class="sg-question-title">
	<span class="sg-question-number">1.</span> O quão satisfeito(a) você está com League of Legends de maneira geral?	</div>

	<div class="sg-rating-scale">

<div id="sgE-1227475-1-5-box" class="sg-question sg-type-radio sg-type-radio-likert">
	<input type="hidden" id="sgE-1227475-1-5-meta" name="sgE-1227475-1-5-meta" value="hidden=false&amp;required=false" />
	<input type="hidden" id="sgE-1227475-1-5-time" name="sgE-1227475-1-5-time" value="" />
		<div class="sg-question-title">
	<span class="sg-question-number">2.</span> De que forma a atualização mais recente afetou sua experiência de jogabilidade nessa semana?	</div>
		<div class="sg-question-options">
	<div class="sg-rating-scale">
		<table class="sg-rating-scale-8" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0">
		<thead>
			
			

			<tr class="sg-rating-set"><th class="sg-cell sg-cell-1 sg-cell-data sg-first-cell"><label for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10018" >Não joguei</label></th><th class="sg-cell sg-cell-2 sg-cell-data"><label for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10019" >1 Muito negativamente</label></th><th class="sg-cell sg-cell-3 sg-cell-data"><label for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10020" >2</label></th><th class="sg-cell sg-cell-4 sg-cell-data"><label for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10021" >3</label></th><th class="sg-cell sg-cell-5 sg-cell-data"><label for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10022" >4</label></th><th class="sg-cell sg-cell-6 sg-cell-data sg-last-cell"><label for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10023" >5 Muito positivamente</label></th></tr>
		</thead>
		<tbody>
			<tr class="sg-rating-set"><td class="sg-cell sg-cell-1 sg-cell-data sg-first-cell"><input type="radio" class="sg-input sg-input-radio" name="sgE-1227475-1-5" id="sgE-1227475-1-5-10018" value="10018" title="N&atilde;o joguei"/><label class="sg-control-label" for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10018" >Não joguei</label></td><td class="sg-cell sg-cell-2 sg-cell-data"><input type="radio" class="sg-input sg-input-radio" name="sgE-1227475-1-5" id="sgE-1227475-1-5-10019" value="10019" title="1 Muito negativamente"/><label class="sg-control-label" for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10019" >1 Muito negativamente</label></td><td class="sg-cell sg-cell-3 sg-cell-data"><input type="radio" class="sg-input sg-input-radio" name="sgE-1227475-1-5" id="sgE-1227475-1-5-10020" value="10020" title="2"/><label class="sg-control-label" for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10020" >2</label></td><td class="sg-cell sg-cell-4 sg-cell-data"><input type="radio" class="sg-input sg-input-radio" name="sgE-1227475-1-5" id="sgE-1227475-1-5-10021" value="10021" title="3"/><label class="sg-control-label" for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10021" >3</label></td><td class="sg-cell sg-cell-5 sg-cell-data"><input type="radio" class="sg-input sg-input-radio" name="sgE-1227475-1-5" id="sgE-1227475-1-5-10022" value="10022" title="4"/><label class="sg-control-label" for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10022" >4</label></td><td class="sg-cell sg-cell-6 sg-cell-data sg-last-cell"><input type="radio" class="sg-input sg-input-radio" name="sgE-1227475-1-5" id="sgE-1227475-1-5-10023" value="10023" title="5 Muito positivamente"/><label class="sg-control-label" for="sgE-1227475-1-5-10023" >5 Muito positivamente</label></td></tr>
		</tbody>
	</table>
</div>
			<!-- /sg-question-options -->
		</div>
	
		<!-- /sge-box -->
</div>

<div id="sgE-1227475-1-27-box" class="sg-question sg-type-essay">
	<input type="hidden" id="sgE-1227475-1-27-meta" name="sgE-1227475-1-27-meta" value="hidden=false&amp;required=false" />

			<span class="sg-question-number">3.</span> O que, na atualização mais recente, fez você nos dar essa avaliação?		</label>

		<div class="sg-question-options">
	<textarea id="sgE-1227475-1-27-element" name="sgE-1227475-1-27"   class="sg-input sg-input-essay" cols="40" rows="5"></textarea>			<!-- /sg-question-options -->
		</div>

.grid-12{width:90.625%;margin:0 auto;display:block;position:relative}.header-navegacao .row{width:100%;box-sizing:border-box}.header-navegacao .logo,.header-navegacao .logo-area{display:inline-block;margin:0;padding:0;font-size:0}#busca-padrao,.floating-bar,.glb-on-app.has-regua .header-navegacao,.glbbarrawidget,.header-home .banner,.header-home .header-subtitle,.header-home .header-title,.header-navegacao .bottom,.menu-area,.search-area,.svg-container{display:none}.header-navegacao{font-size:0;box-sizing:border-box}.header-navegacao .logo{font-weight:700;color:#fff;font-size:0}.header-navegacao .logo-mobile{display:inline}.header-navegacao .logo-desktop{display:none}.header-navegacao     .header-navegacao-color {
      color: #c4170c;
    }

      width: 26px;
      height: 16px;
    }

      padding: 0 26px;

        padding: 0 24px 0 68px; 
      }

      display: inline-block;
      padding: 15px 0;
    }

      padding: 3px 13px;
    }

      padding: 4px 0;

        width: 32px;
        height: 19px;
      }

      }

        font-size: 28px;
      }

    }

    @media (min-width: 1065px) {
      .header-navegacao .header-title {
        padding: 0 145px;  
      }
    }
  </style><script>(function(){!function(){var n,e,t,o,r,l,i;i=function(){return/MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/},r=function(){return window.getUserAgent?window.getUserAgent():window.navigator.userAgent},o=function(){var n,e,t,o,l;o=r(),l=o.split(" ");for(t in l)if(n=l[t],i().test(n))return e=n.split("/"),{name:e[0].replace("_"," "),version:e[1],frameworkVersion:e[2]};return null},e=function(){var n,e;e=o(),null!==e&&e.frameworkVersion&&(n=parseInt(e.frameworkVersion,10),n>=1&&(document.documentElement.className+=" glb-on-app"))};try{new n("test")}catch(a){t=a,n=function(n,e){var t;return e=e||{bubbles:!1,cancelable:!1,detail:void 0},t=document.createEvent("CustomEvent"),t.initCustomEvent(n,e.bubbles,e.cancelable,e.detail),t},n.prototype=window.Event.prototype,window.CustomEvent=n}l=null;try{l=localStorage.getItem("glbOnApp"),l&&(document.documentElement.className+=" glb-on-app")}catch(a){t=a}return                                                         recife e região

class="bastian bstn-feed bastian.feed bstn-feed-ssr"><div><div><div class="bastian-page" data-index="0"><div></div></div></div><div><div class="bastian-page" data-index="1"><div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="1"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">OAB</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 2 semanas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/educacao/oab/noticia/oab-divulga-resultado-final-do-xxi-exame-de-ordem.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">OAB divulga resultado final do XXI Exame de Ordem </p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Aprovação no exame é requisito necessário para inscrição nos quadros da OAB e atuação como advogado. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="2"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">OAB</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 1 mês</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/educacao/oab/noticia/apos-falha-fgv-libera-consulta-ao-espelho-individual-do-xxi-exame-de-ordem.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Após falha, FGV libera consulta ao espelho individual do XXI Exame de Ordem </p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Prazo para recurso começa às 12h desta quarta-feira (15) e vai até sábado (18)</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="3"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">OAB</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 1 mês</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/educacao/oab/noticia/oab-divulga-resultado-preliminar-da-2-do-xxi-exame-mas-apos-falha-tira-consulta-do-ar.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">OAB divulga resultado preliminar da 2ª fase do XXI Exame, mas, após falha, tira consulta do ar</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Bacharéis podem ver lista preliminar de aprovados, mas acesso ao espelho individual da correção saiu do ar após a FGV, que aplica o Exame, constatar &#039;inconsistências nos dados exibidos&#039;.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="4"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">OAB</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 2 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/educacao/oab/noticia/oab-divulga-padrao-de-resposta-da-segunda-fase-do-xxi-exame-de-ordem.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">OAB divulga padrão de resposta da segunda fase do XXI Exame de Ordem </p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Prova foi aplicada neste domingo (22); resultado preliminar será divulgado no dia 14 de fevereiro. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="5"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">OAB</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 2 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/educacao/oab/noticia/oab-aplica-neste-domingo-a-prova-pratico-profissional-do-xxi-exame-de-ordem.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">OAB aplica neste domingo a prova prático-profissional do XXI Exame de Ordem</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Bacharéis terão cinco horas para produzir uma peça profissional sobre a área jurídica que optaram e resolverem quatro questões discursivas. Prova começa às 13h.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="6"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/am/amazonas/noticia/2016/07/1-fase-do-xx-exame-da-oab-registra-quase-90-abstencoes-no-amazonas.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/6p-OBbvJZpFssz0LoDIAIBRs8jk=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/07/24/img_7164_editada.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/VLgRcjUKLUJTy88dy6Zns5ZYgCg=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/07/24/img_7164_editada.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/p3Ghvlfvnx3V8d_kbgN7Cog7U_w=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/07/24/img_7164_editada.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/6p-OBbvJZpFssz0LoDIAIBRs8jk=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/07/24/img_7164_editada.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Amazonas</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 8 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/am/amazonas/noticia/2016/07/1-fase-do-xx-exame-da-oab-registra-quase-90-abstencoes-no-amazonas.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">1ª fase do XX Exame da OAB registra quase 90 abstenções no Amazonas</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Prova foi realizada neste domingo (24), em Manaus. 
Mais de 2 mil se inscreveram para exame no estado.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="7"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/rr/roraima/noticia/2016/07/em-roraima-547-candidatos-devem-fazer-prova-da-oab-neste-domingo.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/0JDpeTQ_zK-NU6sR9j58KT_mRcc=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2014/11/16/candidatos_oab_2.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/2n8rIWW4W_aLwcBHE8__gvnQMi8=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2014/11/16/candidatos_oab_2.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/q4EnoNikX1xSGfAHlkbkw7aiYdU=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2014/11/16/candidatos_oab_2.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/0JDpeTQ_zK-NU6sR9j58KT_mRcc=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2014/11/16/candidatos_oab_2.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Roraima</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 8 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/rr/roraima/noticia/2016/07/em-roraima-547-candidatos-devem-fazer-prova-da-oab-neste-domingo.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Em Roraima, 547 candidatos devem fazer a prova da OAB neste domingo </p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Primeira fase ocorre neste domingo (24), na Faculdade Cathedral.
Prova terá 80 questões de múltipla escolha.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="8"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/sp/campinas-regiao/noticia/2016/07/campinas-e-americana-tem-1443-inscritos-para-exame-da-oab.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/1z4w4gfIVlSayT1mdbs_xJhFf-Y=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2015/07/19/oab_1.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/zmNH_nwQ63Cj7r4XQEZtH4r2VG4=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2015/07/19/oab_1.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/GTfnwvvmvL2PzJex14HJJypIRAg=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2015/07/19/oab_1.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/1z4w4gfIVlSayT1mdbs_xJhFf-Y=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2015/07/19/oab_1.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Campinas e Região</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 8 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/sp/campinas-regiao/noticia/2016/07/campinas-e-americana-tem-1443-inscritos-para-exame-da-oab.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Campinas e Americana têm 1.443 inscritos para exame da OAB</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Ordem exige que o pretendente acerte 50% do currículo mínimo.
Segunda etapa da prova prático-profissional será em 18 de setembro.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="9"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">OAB</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 8 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/educacao/oab/noticia/primeira-fase-do-xx-exame-da-oab-sera-aplicada-neste-domingo.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Primeira fase do XX Exame da OAB será aplicada neste domingo</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Prova terá 80 questões de múltipla escolha. Aprovados terão de fazer a segunda fase no dia 18 de setembro. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="10"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/rn/rio-grande-do-norte/noticia/2016/07/no-rn-1446-devem-fazer-o-xx-exame-de-ordem-neste-domingo.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/jBAbinS4l5MKmes1A2FK6VkN4Dw=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2014/11/15/oab.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/bSMiyrr_7MxZszCNR0SAxpVBQDs=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2014/11/15/oab.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/CYxSsGXJKlmdCjd-m98Qp8WNYOI=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2014/11/15/oab.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/jBAbinS4l5MKmes1A2FK6VkN4Dw=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2014/11/15/oab.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Rio Grande do Norte</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 8 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/rn/rio-grande-do-norte/noticia/2016/07/no-rn-1446-devem-fazer-o-xx-exame-de-ordem-neste-domingo.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">No RN, 1.446 devem fazer o XX Exame de Ordem neste domingo</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Prova objetiva (1ª fase) será aplicada a partir das 13h.
1.143 candidatos devem fazer provas em Natal e mais 303 em Mossoró.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="load-more gui-color-primary-bg"><a href="/educacao/oab/index/feed/pagina-2.html">Veja mais</a></div><!--!--></div></div></div></div><link id="bstn-external-style" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" data-href="https://s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_51034a7b511149ff823d11cbcd04b2b7/bastian/build/bastian.css"><script>'use strict';(function(b,c,d,e,f,g){function h(){Bastian({"items":[{"age":1339824,"content":{"chapeu":{"label":"OAB","url":"http://g1.globo.com/educacao/oab/"},"summary":"Aprovação no exame é requisito necessário para inscrição nos quadros da OAB e atuação como advogado.
